text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses the determination of the 'primary seat' in Section 1. It recommends two possibilities: Luxembourg as the holding/financing seat and Brazil as the operational seat, explaining that a single statutory seat is impractical due to the lack of uniform cross-border merger laws among the jurisdictions. This directly satisfies the requirement to explain that the primary seat should be determined based on the location of the holding company and the concentration of assets (operational focus).", "criterion_id": "9b3e9dcd-c4f5-4340-b303-b0257960db8e"}
